title: recall in aram
body: i was playing aram and i see recall and whit zed i see his recall whit nother champions too

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is working as intended. You won't actually be able to recall to the base. ^-^ Some players exclusively play ARAM, and we wanted them to be able to see the recall, too!
this is an intended feature actually
You can play the recall animation, but not all skins have one, so if you B it may not appear to do anything.
